title: @ServerRequestFilter problems in 2.14.0

labels.name: triage/duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

body:
### Describe the bug

After upgrading to 2.14.0 our API tests are all failing due to a problem with `@ServerRequestFilter`

Maybe related to #29170? 

Class snippet:

```java
@RequestScoped
public class LoggingFilter {

	private final CurrentIdentityAssociation id;

	private static final Logger LOGGER = LoggerFactory.getLogger(LoggingFilter.class);

	@Inject
	public LoggingFilter(final CurrentIdentityAssociation id) {
		this.id = id;
	}

	@ServerRequestFilter(preMatching = true)
	public Uni<Void> logPreMatchingIncomingRequest(final ContainerRequestContext requestContext) {
		requestContext.setProperty("request-start-time",  Instant.now());
                // ......
        }
}
```

StackTrace:

### Expected behavior

No problems with @ServerRequestFilter

### Actual behavior

Problems with @ServerRequestFilter

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux DFrickert 6.0.7-2-MANJARO #1 SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Sun Nov 6 00:09:09 UTC 2022 x86_64 GNU/Linux
